long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blog Heading Viewer

Overview:
Easily capture and review the structure of any blog or article with the Blog Heading Viewer. This Chrome extension scans the active webpage and displays a clear list of all major headings (H1, H2, H3), allowing you to grasp the main points at a glance.

Features:

Quick Scan: Instantly extract and list headings from any webpage.
Copy All: With a single click, copy all headings to your clipboard, perfect for research and note-taking.
Simple Interface: A user-friendly popup shows headings in a neatly organized format.
Efficiency Booster: Ideal for students, researchers, and professionals who need to quickly assess content structure.
Why Blog Heading Viewer?
Whether you're conducting research, studying, or simply browsing, Blog Heading Viewer enhances your browsing experience by providing immediate insights into important content without the need for extensive reading.

Get Started:
Just click the Blog Heading Viewer icon after navigating to any blog or article, and see the headings displayed in an easy-to-read popup. Click 'Copy All' to transfer the headings directly to your clipboard.
